text:
If you comment out the "LoadModule autoindex_module modules/mod_autoindex.so" line in httpd.conf then the "IndexOptions" directive farther down generates a syntax error.

To fix it, the contents of docs/conf/extra/httpd-autoindex.conf.in should be wrapped in a <IfModule mod_autoindex.c> directive.

It may also require a <IfModule mod_alias.c> directive around the "Alias /icons/ "@exp_iconsdir@/"" commands.
creator: dale.wiles@gd-ais.com

text: There is no IndexOptions directive in docs/conf/httpd.conf.in as shipped by Apache.  If you got 2.2.11 somewhere else, maybe that distributor is changing it and you should report it to them.
creator: poirier@pobox.com
